Package main.model

Class Challenge

java.lang.Object
main.model.Challenge
public class Challenge extends Object
Class representing a challenge in the maze game.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public ChallengeType getType()
      Gets the type of the challenge.
      Returns:
      the challenge type

    • attemptChallenge

      public boolean attemptChallenge(Player player, Game game, Room roomToUnlock, Scanner scanner)
      Attempts to resolve the challenge for the given player and room. The method handles both ENIGMA and LEVER challenges, delegating to specific methods based on the challenge type and player type (human or bot).
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting the challenge
      game - the current game instance
      roomToUnlock - the room associated with the challenge
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      Returns:
      true if the challenge is resolved, false otherwise

    • handleEnigma

      private boolean handleEnigma(Player player, Game game, Room roomToUnlock, Scanner scanner)
      Handles the ENIGMA challenge for a human player. The player sees a question and multiple choice answers, and must select the correct answer to resolve the challenge.
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting the challenge
      game - the current game instance
      roomToUnlock - the room associated with the challenge
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      Returns:
      true if the challenge is resolved, false otherwise

    • handleLever

      private boolean handleLever(Player player, Game game, Room roomToUnlock, Scanner scanner)
      Handles the LEVER challenge for a human player. The player must choose the correct lever to unlock the room.
      Parameters:
      player - the player attempting the challenge
      game - the current game instance
      roomToUnlock - the room associated with the challenge
      scanner - the scanner for user input
      Returns:
      true if the challenge is resolved, false otherwise
